name: Hogwarts
descripcion: Sprawling Scottish castle and celebrated School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

children.name: Gryffindor
children.descripcion: With a lion as its crest and Professor McGonagall at its head, Gryffindor is the house which most values the virtues of courage, bravery and determination

children.name: Harry Potter
children.descripcion: Harry Potter is The Boy Who Lived, singled out by Lord Voldemort at birth to be his greatest rival, and our hero

children.name: Ron Weasley
children.descripcion: One of Harry Potter’s two best friends, fellow Gryffindor, and youngest Weasley son

children.name: Hermione Granger
children.descripcion: From bookish Muggle-born to one of Gryffindor's bravest

children.name: Albus Dumbledore
children.descripcion: Hogwarts Headmaster, founder of the Order of the Phoenix, with a fondness for sherbet lemons and knitting patterns

children.name: Minerva McGonagall
children.descripcion: The strict but fair Head of Gryffindor house and Transfiguration teacher

children.name: Neville Longbottom
children.descripcion: A clumsy but keen Herbology student and shy Gryffindor with great inner strength

children.name: James Potter
children.descripcion: Harry's father, and a member of the Marauders and the first Order of the Phoenix. Murdered by Voldemort during the First Wizarding War

children.name: Lily Potter
children.descripcion: Harry’s mother, a talented Muggle-born witch who was murdered by Voldemort during the First Wizarding War

children.name: Sirius Black
children.descripcion: Harry's Animagus godfather who escaped from Azkaban. Old friend of James and Lily Potter

children.name: Remus Lupin
children.descripcion: A member of the Order of the Phoenix, Hogwarts teacher, Tonks’ husband - and a werewolf

children.name: Peter Pettigrew
children.descripcion: Loyal follower of Voldemort who betrayed Harry's parents

children.name: Rubeus Hagrid
children.descripcion: The half-giant Hogwarts gamekeeper loves all creatures and is a tirelessly loyal friend to Harry and Dumbledore

children.name: Lavender Brown
children.descripcion: A sentimental but loyal student and an original member of Dumbledore’s Army. Develops a crush on Ron Weasley

children.name: Seamus Finnigan
children.descripcion: Gryffindor and member of Dumbledore's Army, dormmates with Harry, Ron, Neville and Dean

children.name: Dean Thomas
children.descripcion: Football-loving Gryffindor and member of Dumbledore’s Army

children.name: Parvati Patil
children.descripcion: Harry’s classmate and fellow Gryffindor, best friend of Lavender Brown and member of Dumbledore’s Army

children.name: Colin Creevey
children.descripcion: This Muggle-born Gryffindor and avid photographer is one of Harry’s most devoted fans

children.name: Dennis Creevey
children.descripcion: Colin's equally excitable little brother and the youngest member of Dumbledore's Army

children.name: Ginny Weasley
children.descripcion: The youngest Weasley child. Brave, tenacious and an accomplished Quidditch player

children.name: Lee Jordan
children.descripcion: Friend of the Weasley twins, Quidditch commentator and host of 'Potterwatch'

children.name: Fred Weasley
children.descripcion: George’s twin, Gryffindor Beater and co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes

children.name: George Weasley
children.descripcion: Fred’s twin, Gryffindor Beater and co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes

children.name: Arthur Weasley
children.descripcion: Father of the Weasley family and husband to Molly. Works in the Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office

children.name: Molly Weasley
children.descripcion: The formidable Weasley matriarch and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Skilled in non-verbal magic and duelling, loves Harry like a son

children.name: Bill Weasley
children.descripcion: Laidback eldest Weasley sibling and member of the Order of the Phoenix

children.name: Charlie Weasley
children.descripcion: Second eldest Weasley sibling and dragon aficionado

children.name: Percy Weasley
children.descripcion: Sensible and pompous, Percy is the third eldest Weasley sibling

children.name: Romilda Vane
children.descripcion: An admirer of Harry Potter and a fellow Gryffindor. She spent much of Harry's sixth year trying to slip him a love potion.

children.name: Oliver Wood
children.descripcion: Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper and captain for Harry’s first four years on the team

children.name: Angelina Johnson
children.descripcion: A Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team who becomes captain after Oliver Wood

children.name: Katie Bell
children.descripcion: A Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team and member of Dumbledore’s Army

children.name: Alicia Spinnet
children.descripcion: A Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team and member of Dumbledore’s Army

children.name: Cormac McLaggen
children.descripcion: Gryffindor student and Slug Club member who takes a liking to Hermione, and unsuccessfully competes to become Gryffindor Keeper

children.name: Ravenclaw
children.descripcion: Ravenclaws prize wit, learning, and wisdom. It's an ethos etched into founder Rowena Ravenclaw diadem: 'wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure'

children.name: Luna Lovegood
children.descripcion: Unique Ravenclaw, true friend and artist

children.name: Cho Chang
children.descripcion: Ravenclaw Seeker, member of Dumbledore’s Army, Harry’s first crush

children.name: Gilderoy Lockhart
children.descripcion: Author, professor and five-time winner of Witch Weekly's Most Charming Smile Award

children.name: The Grey Lady
children.descripcion: The mysterious and shy ghost of Ravenclaw Tower, who hides a deep secret.

children.name: Filius Flitwick
children.descripcion: Hogwarts Charms professor and Head of Ravenclaw house

children.name: Sybill Trelawney
children.descripcion: Divination professor at Hogwarts who has prophesied accurately at least twice

children.name: Quirinus Quirrell
children.descripcion: Stuttering, nervous Defence Against the Dark Arts professor who's hiding a dark secret

children.name: Garrick Ollivander
children.descripcion: Considered by many to be the world's best wandmaker, almost everyone at Hogwarts gets their wands from him

children.name: Moaning Myrtle
children.descripcion: Hogwarts ghost who haunts the girls' toilets on the first floor

children.name: Marietta Edgecombe
children.descripcion: Ravenclaw student and friend of Cho Chang. Her betrayal of Dumbledore's Army led to Umbridge being able to find and disband the group.

children.name: Padma Patil
children.descripcion: Parvati Patil’s twin sister and member of Dumbledore’s Army

children.name: Terry Boot
children.descripcion: Ravenclaw student and member of Dumbledore's Army

children.name: Michael Corner
children.descripcion: Ravenclaw, member of Dumbledore's Army and one-time romantic interest of Ginny Weasley

children.name: Anthony Goldstein
children.descripcion: Ravenclaw Prefect and a member of Dumbledore's Army

children.name: Hufflepuff
children.descripcion: Hufflepuffs value hard work, patience, loyalty, and fair play. The house has produced its share of great wizards <U+0096> not least Newt Scamander, author of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them

children.name: Newt Scamander
children.descripcion: Magizoologist and writer of the textbook ‘Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them'

children.name: Pomona Sprout
children.descripcion: Herbology Professor and expert in dangerous plants. Head of Hufflepuff house

children.name: The Fat Friar
children.descripcion: A cheerful Hufflepuff ghost who still resents the fact he was never made a cardinal in life

children.name: Nymphadora Tonks
children.descripcion: A Metamorphmagus and Auror with distinctive hair. Member of the Order of the Phoenix

children.name: Cedric Diggory
children.descripcion: Popular Hufflepuff Seeker and competitor in the Triwizard Tournament

children.name: Hannah Abbott
children.descripcion: Hufflepuff prefect and a loyal member of Dumbledore's Army

children.name: Ernie Macmillan
children.descripcion: A slightly pompous Hufflepuff who was convinced that Harry was the heir of Slytherin

children.name: Zacharias Smith
children.descripcion: Smug member of Dumbledore's Army and one of the first to flee the Battle of Hogwarts

children.name: Susan Bones
children.descripcion: Niece of Amelia Bones, who was Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, and a member of Dumbledore's Army

children.name: Justin Finch-Fletchley
children.descripcion: Muggle-born Hufflepuff student who was also accepted to Eton

children.name: Slytherin
children.descripcion: Slytherin produces more than its share of Dark wizards, but also turns out leaders who are proud, ambitious and cunning. Merlin is one particularly famous Slytherin

children.name: Severus Snape
children.descripcion: Hogwarts Potions master, Head of Slytherin house and former Death Eater. Holds a grudge against Harry

children.name: Draco Malfoy
children.descripcion: A pure-blood wizard, proud Slytherin and Harry Potter’s arch rival at Hogwarts

children.name: Horace Slughorn
children.descripcion: Well-connected Potions master and founder of the Slug Club

children.name: The Bloody Baron
children.descripcion: The Slytherin Ghost is a gaunt and silent spectre covered in silver bloodstains.

children.name: Bellatrix Lestrange
children.descripcion: One of Voldemort’s most loyal Death Eaters, sent to Azkaban for her crimes. A dangerous witch and skilled duelist

children.name: Dolores Umbridge
children.descripcion: A half-blood witch who is a sinister Ministry bureaucrat and one-time Hogwarts teacher

children.name: Vincent Crabbe
children.descripcion: One half of Draco Malfoy's duo of hulking henchmen

children.name: Gregory Goyle
children.descripcion: One of Draco Malfoy’s two thuggish Slytherin sidekicks

children.name: Lucius Malfoy
children.descripcion: Draco's father who serves Lord Voldemort as a Death Eater in both Wizarding Wars

children.name: Narcissa Malfoy
children.descripcion: Pure-blood witch whose only redeeming quality is her great love for her son, Draco

children.name: Pansy Parkinson
children.descripcion: Slytherin student, ardent admirer of Draco Malfoy and member of the Inquisitorial Squad

children.name: Blaise Zabini
children.descripcion: Slytherin student, friend of Draco Malfoy and member of the Slug Club

children.name: Tom Riddle
children.descripcion: A troubled young wizard with an affinity for the Dark Arts and manipulation

children.name: Lord Voldemort
children.descripcion: Formerly known as Tom Marvolo Riddle and commonly referred to as He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. The most powerful Dark wizard of all time
